welcome: Welcome to fauna-wallet. You account has successfully been registered.
help:
*Help Commands*:
* - To Create a new wallet /NewWallet
* - To Delete a well /DeleteWallet
* - To send tokens to another wallet /SendToken
* - To get QR code and address of a wallet /WalletDetails
* - To get all transaction details to a particular wallet /WalletHistory


*To get this help message again /help
newWallet:
